name: Elementals (itch) (Prietse)
description:
Four Elements, One Goal!

Protect the crystal for as long as you can! 

Join Elements to form greater power to defeat this corruption coming from the void!

in the end, You will forever be joined to the game!

Controls: 

Q & E : swtich Elements

Left Click : Attack 

Right Click : Secondary Attack

WASD : Movement

Hints: 

Fire + Earth(Secondary) = Magma

Water +  Earth(Secondary)  = Mud
